messages.message: <!here> we have mitigated the issues that were seen in this incident with DB health, and are now running AIHub MT env (aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com)) on 25.08. Can someone please check that they do not see any visible issues using this environment?
@sudeep I will ask one of the customers to test and let you know.
Not able to delete the project
@Vinay Thapa Are you able to upload files and use converse?
Stuck in digitisation, its only 200 kb pdf, 8 pages long
@sudeep app-tasks is failing to startup. Rabbitmq pods are not up.

thanks all, can you please recheck again, we ran into a corrupted RMQ state that caused these. this was addressed a little while ago, and since then we ran suite of tests again to confirm tht platform is healthy. Will be good to know if you are seeing any issues currently.
I can see app-tasks working fine now.
